name: Marcus Ihme
message: Happy Birthday Kristine! You're turning 20 and I'm so proud of you and the things you are accomplishing. I'm so lucky to have met you despite all odds, and extremely happy that I could come to the U.S. and visit you for your 20'th birthday. I'm in no doubt that we'll have an amazing day in Connecticut together with you favorite dinner, Indian food. I'm sure you'll have an amazing year as a 20 year old in the middle of New York. I love you!
